page.title: 05PETS GALORE
page.content: I have got quite a lot of pets. I have got one mouse and two rabbits and a goldfish and a cat. We had some babies from the mouse but we sold them to the pet shop. There were ten of them and we are getting a dog next year and it is going to be a cocker spaniel with fluffy ears off one of my mum's friends at work. We are probably getting it next year because it is only a puppy now and not very big yet. It is a dog like Tracey's dog. Our cat is called Sooty but still I can't wait till next year.
